caption.p: Incidence of infected seeds after treatments with sterile distilled water (negative control), 0.1% Tween 20, three concentrations of the seven essential oils (as indicated), and the fungicides combination (25 g/L difenoconazole plus 25 g/L fludioxonil; positive control), assayed using the blotter method. Data are means ± standard error ( n = 10; 10 seeds/treatment/concentration). Means with different letters are significantly different ( p ≤ 0.05; Fisher’s LSD tests).
